personalInfo.name: Akshay Vadchhak
personalInfo.title: Team Leader
personalInfo.summary: Experienced Team Leader and Senior Android Engineer with 4+ years of expertise in native Android application development. Since February 2025, serving as a Team Leader, leading end-to-end Android projects and mentoring developers to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions. Proven track record in building high-performance mobile applications using Java, Android SDK, and modern architectural patterns such as MVVM and Clean Architecture. Skilled in integrating RESTful APIs, managing local databases (Room, SQLite), and optimizing app performance and UI/UX. Strong background in full-cycle Android development—from concept to deployment—with excellent problem-solving abilities, leadership skills, and a collaborative mindset.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable native Android applications using Java and Android SDK
Implemented clean architecture patterns such as MVVM and MVP for maintainable codebases
Integrated RESTful APIs and handled data persistence using Room and SQLite
Optimized app performance, memory usage, and battery efficiency
Collaborated with designers and backend teams to deliver seamless user experiences
Published and maintained applications on the Google Play Store
achievements: Successfully delivered 4+ major Android applications from concept to deployment
Improved app performance and load times by up to 30% through code optimization
Developed and maintained apps collectively serving over 20 million users with high ratings on the Play Store
Led code reviews, mentored junior developers, and ensured adherence to best practices
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and automated builds using Gradle and Firebase tools

projects.title: Flyerwiz
projects.description: Flyerwiz is a user-friendly and AI-powered flyer maker app that allows users to design professional-quality flyers, posters, banners, invitations, and social media graphics quickly and easily. The app includes over 30,000 customizable templates and AI-powered tools to simplify the design process.
features: 30,000+ ready-to-use templates for flyers, posters, banners, invitations, and social media graphics
Templates covering 200+ industries and 500+ events & festivals
Fully customizable with fonts, colors, stickers, backgrounds, shapes, and textures
AI Flyer Generator for instant flyer creation with smart suggestions
AI Background Remover for one-tap photo background replacement
AI Listicle Content Writer for automatic poster and ad text generation
Video Flyer Generation using Python-based API for animated content
QR Code Generator for scannable flyer interactions
Clickable links in exported PDFs for interactive digital sharing
Branding tools to add logos, brand colors, and custom styles
Export designs in multiple formats for print or digital use
Direct social media sharing support
Premium access to unlock all templates and AI tools
responsibilities: Gathered requirements and conducted brainstorming sessions
Developed responsive UI from Figma design using XML and Material Design
Implemented RESTful APIs with Volley and integrated backend services
Optimized code structure for better performance and scalability
Performed bug fixing and content verification before release
